<h1 class="text-4xl leading-11 md:leading-11 lg:leading-11 md:text-5xl lg:text-6xl font-sans font-bold text-gray-900">Identity Security <br>& Governance</h1>
<p class="mt-6 lg:mt-12 leading-normal lg:leading-normal text-xl md:text-2xl font-sans text-gray-900 max-w-md">Secure identity with self-service access, just-in-time provisioning, and automated access reviews.</p>
<div class="mt-6 lg:mt-14 flex sm:flex-row items-center gap-3 flex-col-reverse">
<a href=/lp/free-trial class="inline-flex w-full sm:w-auto justify-center px-6 py-3 font-semibold tracking-wide text-lg leading-none text-center text-violet border-2 rounded border-violet font-sans">

</a>

<h2 class="tracking-widest-2 text-center uppercase text-sm sm:text-base font-heading text-gray-500 md:text-violet font-bold mb-20">Trusted by cloud-forward companies</h2>

<div>
<p class="mb-10 leading-none font-heading text-sm sm:text-base text-violet tracking-widest-2 uppercase font-bold">Access requests</p>
<h2 class="text-2xl sm:text-4xl md:text-5xl md:leading-tight font-sans font-bold text-gray-900 lg:-ml-1 tracking-tight">Self-service access requests that employees love</h2>
<p class="mt-8 sm:mt-14 leading-7 text-lg sm:text-base font-sans text-gray-900 lg:pr-12">Customizable app catalogs and self-service access requests via Slack make it easy for your workforce to get access to what they need, and no more.</p>

<p class="mb-10 leading-none font-heading text-sm sm:text-base text-violet tracking-widest-2 uppercase font-bold">Infrastructure access</p>
<h2 class="text-2xl sm:text-4xl md:text-5xl md:leading-tight font-sans font-bold text-gray-900 lg:-ml-1 tracking-tight max-w-xl">Temporary elevated access for engineering teams</h2>
<p class="mt-5 text-lg sm:text-base leading-relaxed font-sans text-gray-900 max-w-lg">Secure cloud infrastructure by granting and provisioning access just in time – and automatically deprovisioning when it’s no longer needed.</p>
<div class="mt-6 grid sm:grid-cols-3 gap-4 mr-8">
<div>
<hr class="border-gray-400 w-16 mb-2 hidden sm:inline-block">

<div class="rounded-xl shadow-lg overflow-hidden relative bg-violet">
<img class="absolute bg-cover w-full h-full bg-gradient-0" src=https://d33wubrfki0l68.cloudfront.net/65cf8d7e030f72c7be0f6a41ad1a0ca7280485f2/adf98/images/bg-testimonial-1.png alt=Gradient>
<img class="absolute bg-cover w-full h-full bg-gradient-1" src=https://d33wubrfki0l68.cloudfront.net/258892664a7f12fd5f41cd33e4d881b71e55cf79/8b55e/images/bg-testimonial-2.png alt=Gradient>

<div class="relative p-6 sm:p-8 md:px-24 py-10 sm:py-14">
<p class="text-2xl md:text-4xl leading-normal md:leading-normal font-sans text-white">“The fewer people who have access to customer data and the less time they have to access that data, the better.”</p>
<hr class="border-white w-24 my-10 sm:hidden">
<div class="flex items-center sm:mt-14">
<hr class="border-white w-20 mr-9 hidden md:block">

<div class="text-15 sm:text-xl text-white font-sans">
<p class=font-bold>Paul Yoo</p>
<p class=font-normal>Head of Security Assurance</p>

<div class="grid gap-y-10 gap-x-12 xl:gap-x-20 lg:grid-cols-2 my-20">
<div>
<h2 class="text-4xl sm:text-5xl md:text-7xl leading-tight sm:leading-tight md:leading-tight font-sans font-bold text-gray-900 lg:-ml-1 tracking-tighter gradient-green">Reduce time spent on access requests by 95%</h2>
</div>
<div class="flex flex-col">
<p class="xl:mt-1.5 leading-normal md:leading-normal sm:leading-normal text-xl sm:text-2xl md:text-3xl font-sans text-gray-900">Ramp saw a 95% reduction in IT effort required to process access request tickets with ConductorOne.</p>
<a href=/customers/ramp/ class="mt-10 lg:mt-auto lg:mb-4 leading-none text-lg font-semibold font-sans text-gray-900 hover:text-violet inline-flex items-start space-x-3">
<span class=underline>Read case study</span><svg class="w-5 h-5" width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M16.1932 10.4243C16.4275 10.1899 16.4275 9.81005 16.1932 9.57574L12.3748 5.75736c-.234300000000001-.23432-.6142-.23432-.8485.0C11.292 5.99167 11.292 6.37157 11.5263 6.60589L14.9204 10l-3.3941 3.3941C11.292 13.6284 11.292 14.0083 11.5263 14.2426 11.7606 14.477 12.1405 14.477 12.3748 14.2426l3.8184-3.8183zM4.23047 10.6H15.7689V9.4H4.23047v1.2z" fill="currentcolor"/><circle cx="10" cy="10" r="9.4" stroke="currentcolor" stroke-width="1.2"/></svg>
</a>
</div>
</div>
<div>
<hr x-data="{visible: false}" x-intersect.once="visible = true" :class="visible ? 'w-full' : 'w-12'" class="w-12 transition-all ease-out delay-1000 duration-1500 border-gray-800">
</div>
</div>

<div class="pb-5 pt-20 lg:pt-48 overflow-hidden bg-gray-50">
<div class="max-w-screen-xl px-6 mx-auto md:px-8">
<div class="rounded-xl shadow-lg overflow-hidden bg-cover bg-no-repeat bg-gradient-to-br from-white to-violet-light">
<div class="px-8 pt-12">
<p class="mb-10 leading-none text-sm sm:text-base font-heading text-violet tracking-widest-2 uppercase font-bold">Access Reviews</p>
<div class="grid gap-y-8 gap-x-5 lg:grid-cols-2">
<div class="flex flex-col">
<h2 class="text-2xl sm:text-4xl md:text-5xl lg:text-6xl md:leading-tight lg:leading-11 lg:mb-16 font-sans font-bold text-gray-900 lg:-ml-1 tracking-tight lg:pr-12">Fully automated user access reviews</h2>
<hr class="mt-16 lg:mt-auto border-violet mb-1 hidden lg:block">
</div>
<div class="flex flex-col">
<p class="leading-relaxed md:leading-relaxed text-lg md:text-2xl font-sans text-gray-900">Get access reviews up and running in a fraction of the time spent managing them manually, with an experience that doesn’t suck for your GRC team or your employees.</p>
<a href=/products/access-reviews/ class="mt-12 lg:mt-auto leading-none font-semibold font-sans text-violet hover:text-gray-900 inline-flex items-start space-x-2">

</a>

<p class="text-2xl md:text-4xl leading-normal md:leading-normal font-sans text-white">“ConductorOne had a vision that matched ours, they were incredibly collaborative, iterative, and innovative.”</p>
<hr class="border-white w-24 my-10 sm:hidden">
<div class="flex items-center sm:mt-14">

<div class="grid gap-y-10 gap-x-12 xl:gap-x-20 lg:grid-cols-2 my-20">
<div>
<h2 class="text-4xl sm:text-5xl md:text-7xl leading-tight sm:leading-tight md:leading-tight font-sans font-bold text-gray-900 lg:-ml-1 tracking-tighter gradient-green">Automate 85% of access reviews work</h2>
</div>
<div class="flex flex-col">
<p class="xl:mt-1.5 leading-normal md:leading-normal sm:leading-normal text-xl sm:text-2xl md:text-3xl font-sans text-gray-900">DigitalOcean completed their access reviews across seven departments with 85% less time and effort compared to previous reviews.</p>
<a href=/customers/case-study-digitalocean/ class="mt-10 lg:mt-auto lg:mb-4 leading-none text-lg font-semibold font-sans text-gray-900 hover:text-violet inline-flex items-start space-x-3">
<span class=underline>Read case study</span><svg class="w-5 h-5" width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M16.1932 10.4243C16.4275 10.1899 16.4275 9.81005 16.1932 9.57574L12.3748 5.75736c-.234300000000001-.23432-.6142-.23432-.8485.0C11.292 5.99167 11.292 6.37157 11.5263 6.60589L14.9204 10l-3.3941 3.3941C11.292 13.6284 11.292 14.0083 11.5263 14.2426 11.7606 14.477 12.1405 14.477 12.3748 14.2426l3.8184-3.8183zM4.23047 10.6H15.7689V9.4H4.23047v1.2z" fill="currentcolor"/><circle cx="10" cy="10" r="9.4" stroke="currentcolor" stroke-width="1.2"/></svg>
</a>
</div>
</div>
<div>
<hr x-data="{visible: false}" x-intersect.once="visible = true" :class="visible ? 'w-full' : 'w-12'" class="w-12 transition-all ease-out delay-1000 duration-1500 border-gray-800">
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="pb-5 pt-20 lg:pt-48 relative overflow-hidden bg-gray-50">
<div class="max-w-screen-xl px-6 mx-auto md:px-8">
<div class="rounded-xl shadow-lg overflow-hidden bg-cover bg-no-repeat bg-gradient-to-br from-white to-violet-light">
<div class="grid grid-cols-1 gap-y-8 lg:grid-cols-12 items-end">
<div class="pl-8 pt-12 lg:pb-12 lg:col-span-5">
<div>
<p class="mb-10 leading-none font-heading text-sm sm:text-base text-violet tracking-widest-2 uppercase font-bold">Least Privilege</p>
<h2 class="text-2xl sm:text-4xl md:text-5xl md:leading-tight font-sans font-bold text-gray-900 lg:-ml-1 tracking-tight">Remove unused access and licenses</h2>
<p class="mt-8 sm:mt-14 leading-7 text-lg sm:text-base font-sans text-gray-900 lg:pr-12">Identify unused accounts and off-board them with a few clicks. Implement a non-usage policy that removes unused access periodically to save license costs and reduce your standing access footprint.</p>
<a href=/solutions/least-privilege-access/ class="mt-6 sm:mt-16 leading-none font-semibold font-sans text-violet inline-flex items-start space-x-2">
<span class=underline>Learn more</span><svg class="w-5 h-5" width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M16.1932 10.4243C16.4275 10.1899 16.4275 9.81005 16.1932 9.57574L12.3748 5.75736c-.234300000000001-.23432-.6142-.23432-.8485.0C11.292 5.99167 11.292 6.37157 11.5263 6.60589L14.9204 10l-3.3941 3.3941C11.292 13.6284 11.292 14.0083 11.5263 14.2426 11.7606 14.477 12.1405 14.477 12.3748 14.2426l3.8184-3.8183zM4.23047 10.6H15.7689V9.4H4.23047v1.2z" fill="currentcolor"/><circle cx="10" cy="10" r="9.4" stroke="currentcolor" stroke-width="1.2"/></svg>
</a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="lg:col-span-7 lg:pt-9 pl-6 lg:hidden">
<picture>

</div>
<div class="lg:col-span-7 lg:pt-9 pl-6 hidden lg:block">

<div class=lg:pt-4>
<div>
<h2 class="text-5xl md:text-6xl md:leading-tight font-sans font-bold text-white">You can’t protect <br><mark><s><i>what you can’t see</i></mark></s></h2>
<p class="mt-10 sm:mt-14 text-xl md:text-2xl leading-relaxed md:leading-relaxed font-sans text-white">A complete view of identity and access across your SaaS, IaaS, back office, and on-prem apps. Identify over privilege, orphaned accounts, and potential security threats in minutes.</p>
<hr class="mt-16 border-white max-w-sm hidden lg:block">
</div>
</div>
<picture>

<h2 class="text-2xl md:text-3xl font-sans font-bold text-gray-900">Latest on the platform</h2>
<div class="grid md:grid-cols-3 divide-y-1 divide-gray-900 md:divide-x-1 md:divide-y-0 md:-mx-8">
<div class="flex flex-col py-8 md:py-0 md:px-8">
<h3 class="mb-4 tracking-widest-2 uppercase font-bolds font-heading text-violet">News</h3>

<h2 class="text-5xl sm:text-6xl font-bold md:text-7xl font-sans">Talk to us</h2>

<p class="text-lg sm:text-2xl md:text-3xl leading-relaxed md:leading-relaxed font-sans">If your access controls are leaving you with questions about your security and managing permissions is too unwieldy and time consuming–let’s talk. <br><strong>Your company will love you for it.</strong></p>
